Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP for a year now and it quickly became my favorite game.
When I started I was building impractical crashing rockets. But thanks to the game amazing community on youtube and on this forum: I can now still build impractical crashing rockets but somehow get my crew back. I even manage to get them back alive sometimes

So I finally join the forum, I can then thank all the good people behind the great advices and incredible mods. And why not also share some of my own experiments, like the day I discovered a new way to land my ship on the Mun (and it's surprisingly more stable than it looks like).

Also I'm french so sorry in advance for the spelling and grammar mistakes ^^

Your English is fine. And welcome to the forum. 

That was a lucky non-break with the solar panel.

7 hours ago, Difool said:

I've been playing KSP for a year now and it quickly became my favorite game.
When I started I was building impractical crashing rockets. But thanks to the game amazing community on youtube and on this forum: I can now still build impractical crashing rockets but somehow get my crew back. I even manage to get them back alive sometimes

So I finally join the forum, I can then thank all the good people behind the great advices and incredible mods. And why not also share some of my own experiments, like the day I discovered a new way to land my ship on the Mun (and it's surprisingly more stable than it looks like).

Also I'm french so sorry in advance for the spelling and grammar mistakes ^^

Welcome!


I always giggle a bit when non-native English speakers apologize for their grammar.  You generally write English better than a large portion of native speakers.

That's an incredible landing.  Usually solar panels break on me when I look at them the wrong way.
Yes that was a lucky shot ^^ Now I keep it this way for tourists, it's my lunar tower of Pisa
Welcome to the forums. It's a fun place to be, with everything from games, memes, to space stations that people can build together, and contests.

I landed that way on my first Mün landing too, but my panels broke.  

 

Welcome to the forums!

Edited October 29, 2017 by Lo Var Lachland
